mapper.insert: INSERT INTO busybee_bbs(`ref`, step, `depth`, id, title, content, wdate, readcount, org, filename, newfilename, category, del) VALUES((select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from busybee_bbs b), 0, 0, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, #{org}, #{filename}, #{newfilename}, #{category}, 0)
mapper.update: update busybee_bbs set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename}, newfilename=#{newfilename}, wdate=now() where seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into busybee_bbscomment(seq, id, content, wdate) values(#{seq}, #{id}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select seq, anseq, id, content, wdate from busybee_bbscomment where seq=#{seq} order by wdate desc
